title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, May 6, 2021
description: On this day in 1935 Franklin Roosevelt created the Works Progress Administration. The WPA employed 8.5 million out-of-work people on 1.4 million individual projects.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1935 Franklin Roosevelt created the Works Progress Administration. The WPA employed 8.5 million out-of-work people on 1.4 million individual projects.
